question: There are 194 first-graders at Sunny Hill School. 98 of them are girls. On Tuesday, 7 first-grade girls and 8 first-grade boys were absent. How many first grade boys were at Sunny Hill School on Tuesday?
answer:
Of the 194 first graders, 98 are girls, so 194 students - 98 girls = <<194-98=96>>96 boys.
On Tuesday there were 96 boys - 8 absent = <<96-8=88>>88 boys.
#### 88
